response.overview: In post-Sept. 11 Los Angeles, tensions erupt when the lives of a Brentwood housewife, her district attorney husband, a Persian shopkeeper, two cops, a pair of carjackers and a Korean couple converge during a 36-hour period.
response.tagline: Moving at the speed of life, we are bound to collide with each other.
response.title: Crash

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
